Uses of Class
org.dataconservancy.packaging.tool.model.PackageOntologyException

  • Packages that use PackageOntologyException 
    Package Description
    org.dataconservancy.packaging.tool.api  
    org.dataconservancy.packaging.tool.impl  

    • Uses of PackageOntologyException in org.dataconservancy.packaging.tool.api

      Methods in org.dataconservancy.packaging.tool.api that throw PackageOntologyException 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      PackageTree PackageOntologyService.buildPackageTree(PackageDescription packageDescription)
      Given a valid PackageDescription, returns a tree of PackageNodes, keyed by the ids of the artifacts in the PackageNodes.
      boolean PackageOntologyService.canCollapseParentArtifact(PackageTree tree, String currentArtifactId)
      Checks whether an artifact's parent can be removed from the tree, connecting the artifact directly to its grandparent.
      void PackageOntologyService.changeType(PackageDescription packageDesc, PackageTree packageTree, String artifactId, String newTypeName)
      Performs necessary mapping to change the artifact's type to the new type specified by newTypeName.
      String PackageOntologyService.collapseParentArtifact(PackageDescription packageDesc, PackageTree tree, String currentArtifactId)
      Performs the operations needed to remove an artifact's parent from the tree and connect the artifact directly to its grandparent.
      Set<String> PackageOntologyService.getValidTypes(PackageTree tree, String currentArtifactId)
      Given a PackageTree, returns a set of valid alternative types for the PackageArtifact identified by currentArtifactId according to its position in the graph and the ontology associated with this service.
      void PackageOntologyService.validateProperties(PackageArtifact artifact)
      Ensure that the PackageArtifact has the required properties according to specified ontology.

      void DcsBoPackageOntologyServiceImpl.changeType(PackageDescription packageDesc, PackageTree tree, String artifactId, String newTypeName)
      In this implementation, changing from DataFile to MetadataFile and vice versa affects the relationship of the current artifact to its parent (isMetadataFor vs isMemberOf).
      String DcsBoPackageOntologyServiceImpl.collapseParentArtifact(PackageDescription packageDesc, PackageTree tree, String fileArtifactId) 
      Set<String> DcsBoPackageOntologyServiceImpl.getValidTypes(PackageTree tree, String currentArtifactId)
      Gets the available types for the given artifact, based on it's contextual location in the tree.
